title: Change to regular app with dock icon (keep menu bar)
description:
dispatched_by: mayor

Change from LSUIElement (agent app) to a regular app with dock icon. This may help with window focus issues.

Changes needed:
- Remove LSUIElement=true from Info.plist (or set to false)
- Keep the menu bar status item
- The dock icon can be the same symbol or a custom icon

title: Witness Patrol
description: Per-rig worker monitor patrol loop with progressive nudging.

title: Add 'How to Use' section to README
description:
dispatched_by: mayor

Add documentation explaining how to use Prompter:
- How to trigger the app (hotkey, menu bar icon)
- How to enter prompts
- What the three modes (Primary/Strict/Exploratory) do
- How templates work
- How to copy generated prompts

title: Set up GitHub Actions build CI
description:
dispatched_by: mayor

Create .github/workflows/build.yml:
- Trigger on pull requests
- Run xcodebuild or swift build
- Fail PR if build fails
- No tests required, just build verification

title: Implement Claude Code CLI service
description:
dispatched_by: mayor

Create PromptService that shells out to Claude Code CLI:
- Run 'claude' command with appropriate prompts
- Parse JSON response for primary/strict/exploratory variants
- Handle errors gracefully
- Stream output support if possible
close_reason: Implemented PromptService with Claude Code CLI integration

title: Implement Prompter MVP with Claude Code integration
description:
Implement the full Prompter spec as a macOS menu bar app. Key requirements:
1. Use Claude Code CLI as primary LLM backend (shell out to 'claude' command)
2. Complete Xcode project with build infrastructure
3. All UI components from spec (MainView, SettingsView, templates, history)
4. Build scripts + README for clean checkout builds
5. GitHub Actions CI for build gating on PRs
close_reason: All sub-tasks completed: project structure, CI, Claude Code integration, and UI components implemented

title: Create Xcode project structure with build scripts
description:
dispatched_by: mayor

Create a proper Xcode project structure for the Prompter macOS app:
- Package.swift or .xcodeproj for building
- Info.plist with LSUIElement=true (agent app)
- Build script: ./build.sh (or make)
- Document build process in README.md
- Ensure xcodebuild can build from clean checkout

title: Complete SwiftUI views and data models
description:
dispatched_by: mayor

Implement remaining UI components per spec:
- MainView with input field, tabs (Primary/Strict/Exploratory), history sidebar
- SettingsView for API key management and hotkey config
- PromptHistory and CustomTemplate SwiftData models
- Template system with default templates
close_reason: Implemented all SwiftUI views and data models

title: Deacon Patrol
description: Mayor's daemon patrol loop for handling callbacks, health checks, and cleanup.

title: Fix settings window auto-closing on click
description:
dispatched_by: mayor

Settings window closes immediately when clicking inside it. Users cannot change any settings.

Likely issue: Window focus/behavior settings or popover behavior. Need to fix so settings remain open and interactive.
close_reason: Fixed by dementus - merged to main

title: Refinery Patrol
description: Merge queue processor patrol loop with verification gates.

title: Fix CI workflow to use Swift Package Manager
description:
dispatched_by: mayor

The CI workflow references Prompter.xcodeproj but the project uses Package.swift. 

Fix: Update .github/workflows/build.yml to use 'swift build -c release' instead of xcodebuild with xcodeproj.

This is critical for build gating on PRs.
close_reason: Fixed: Updated .github/workflows/build.yml to use swift build -c release instead of xcodebuild. Branch pushed: polecat/slit-mkcvixjz

state: active

title: Connect prompt submission to Claude Code CLI
description:
dispatched_by: mayor

When user enters a prompt and submits, it only stores to history but doesn't actually call Claude Code CLI to generate variants.

Fix: Wire up submitPrompt() in MainView to call PromptService.generateVariants() and display the results in the UI.
